title: Antoine Fuqua's Wife Living Her Best Life Following Nicole Murphy's Apology
text:
Director Antoine Fuqua’s wife is unbothered and living her best life, following Nicole Murphy publicly apologizing for kissing her husband.

Murphy recently sat down with Wendy Williams and discussed the infamous photo of her kissing Antoine. Over the summer, Murphy was snapped in a bikini kissing the married director.

After the photos were released Murphy tried to claim the kiss was innocent, despite being caught in multiple photos kissing Fuqua.

During the sit-down, Williams grilled Murphy about the situation and didn’t seemed pleased by the behavior.

View photos

The talk show host told the audience Murphy was a hot topic for “kissing a married man.” Murphy then made a kissing sound with her lips which Williams didn’t like.

Murphy said the photo was “a frozen in time pic” and “I wish it didn’t happen. I think it’s a moment where I should have thought more through the situation, make better judgments, it’s something I apologize for.”

Williams even flashed a photo of Fuqua and his wife, Lela Rochon, behind Murphy. Fuqua and Rochon have been married since 1999.

View photos

Rochon is out here living her best life amid Murphy’s public apology. She posted a photo of her hanging out with her close girlfriends, including Angela Bassett. Rochon looks gorgeous in a glittery silver dress.

Since the kissing scandal, Rochon has remained unbothered and stays traveling with her close friends.

View photos

She recently shared photos from a trip to Cannes and Saint-Tropez. Rochon was spotted hanging with Holly Robinson Peete along with Magic Johnson and his wife Cookie.
